original_text: Zechariah asked for something to write on. He wrote, ‘His name is John.’ Everyone was very surprised at what he wrote. Zechariah asked for something to write on. He wrote, ‘His name is John.’ Everyone was very surprised at what he wrote.
korean_text: 그가 서판을 달라 하여 그 이름을 요한이라 쓰매 다 놀랍게 여기더라

sentences.original_text: Zechariah asked for something to write on
